name: Cryptid Corral
description:
Cryptid Corral is a small love letter to classic games like Monster Rancher and Dragon Seeds. Summon Cryptids through unique 'Rune Patterns' and train them to compete in the coliseum against opponents of increasing difficulty.

  • 100 unique Cryptids.
  • Life-death system. No one monster can last forever.
  • Fusion system. The DNA of two deceased Cryptids can be fused together to create a new baby Cryptid with some of its ancestors' power.
  • Highly moddable. All source files are writable.
